title: Math Mobile Learning Design Strategies Using Meta-Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and mobile device usage experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening math problem-solving activities using mobile devices in VR/simulation environments

learning_goals: The effectiveness of mobile learning in mathematics education can be evaluated based on meta-analysis results.
Strategies for inducing learner engagement can be applied when designing VR/simulation-based mobile learning.
Collaborative learning scenarios using mobile devices can be developed in large-classroom environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
